‚Ä¢ **Local Customs**: New Yorkers value efficiency ‚Äì keep sidewalk walking pace brisk, and avoid blocking pedestrian flow. Tipping 15-20% is standard in restaurants. *For personalized etiquette tips, consider taking a cultural orientation session.*
‚Ä¢ **Transportation**: Get a MetroCard ($1 fee) or OMNY contactless payment for subways/buses. Download Citymapper or Google Maps for real-time transit updates. *Pro tip: Purchase a 7-day unlimited MetroCard if staying longer than 5 days.*

  - Breakfast: Bagels with lox at Russ & Daughters (*Try their 'Classic' sandwich*)
  - Iconic View: Top of the Rock at sunset (*Book tickets online for 20% discount*)
  - Local Secret: Free Staten Island Ferry for skyline views (*Best photo spots: right side when departing Manhattan*)
‚Ä¢ **Seasonal Tip**: Pack layers ‚Äì weather changes rapidly. Winter requires thermal wear; summer needs breathable clothing. *Check [NYC Weather Forecast](https://weather.com) 3 days before packing.*
‚Ä¢ **Safety**: Standard urban precautions apply ‚Äì be aware in crowded areas and keep valuables secure. *Register with your embassy's STEP program for emergency alerts.*
‚Ä¢ **New! Hidden Gems**:
  - Elevated Acre: Secret park near Wall Street
  - Roosevelt Island Tram: Affordable skyline views
  - Queens Night Market: Authentic global street food
